name: tiffin-wale
description: TiffinMate - A comprehensive food delivery platform

scripts.deploy:mobile: cd interface/student-app && npm run build:gcloud && gcloud app deploy app.yaml
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd interface/official-web-app && npm run build:gcloud && gcloud app deploy app.yaml
scripts.all:dev: concurrently "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev" "npm run mobile:dev"
scripts.deploy:all: npm run backend:build && cd monolith_backend && gcloud app deploy && cd ../interface/official-web-app && npm run build && gcloud app deploy && cd ../student-app && npm run deploy:gcloud && cd ../../ && gcloud app deploy dispatch.yaml
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd monolith_backend && npm install && cd ../interface/official-web-app && npm install && cd ../student-app && npm install
